entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 March 2023
